subject: SCIENCE
name: Elementary Science Terms
description: Basic science vocabulary for kindergarten through 2nd grade

entries.clue: Star that gives us light and heat
Round object in the night sky
Twinkles in the night sky
Water falling from clouds
White fluffy thing in the sky
Moving air you can feel
Frozen water that falls in winter
Living thing with leaves
Tall plant with trunk and branches
Small thing that grows into a plant
Green part of a plant
Part of plant under the ground
Living thing that can move around
Animal with feathers that can fly
Animal that swims in water
Hard thing found on the ground
Liquid we drink
What we breathe
High temperature
Low temperature
